https://tmrev.io/movie/794945-Bear to the Right 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "TO GET THE MONEY, YOU GOTTA GET THE BEAR!!!" These are the only instructions given by a major crime boss that send two would-be thugs in Laughlin, Nevada chasing a person in a bear suit through one weird situation after another. It is a comedy of misadventure, mayhem, and monster laughs in pursuit of the loot... only to find out 'Wrong Bear'!!! And that's just the beginning... Bear to the Right
